text:
A 55-year-old unidentified man was found dead in an unreserved coach of Ananthapuri Express on Sunday morning.

Sources in the Tamil Nadu Railway Police (TRP) said a few passengers had claimed he boarded the train at Nanguneri. He wore a black pant and a red shirt. The police found some pain killers in his pocket and no other documents, including the journey ticket to establish his identity. The body was sent to the Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital.
title: Found dead on train
